mdRecord.dcterms:title: WSLS-TV reporter Bill Walker interviews Fred H. Burtner, a member of the Blacksburg Jaycees, about sponsoring an NBA game at the Salem Roanoke Valley Civic Center in Salem, Va.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Blacksburg Jaycees member Fred H. Burtner tells WSLS-TV reporter Bill Walker that the Blacksburg Chapter of Jaycees International is sponsoring a National Basketball Association game at the Salem Roanoke Valley Civic Center in Salem, Va. The Atlanta Hawks will face the Boston Celtics in an expensive $6000 game. According to Burtner, this is a worthwhile cause because the proceeds from the game will go toward the Blacksburg Jaycees' youth sports projects.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Boston Celtics (Basketball team)
Atlanta Hawks (Basketball team)
Jaycees International
